doc.title: Controller
doc.desc: The Controller class is a class that manages the controller. You cannot create objects from this class (this class cannot be accessed directly). You can access the object of this class via Debug.controller.

member.name: visible
member.shortdesc: Whether it is visible or not
member.desc: Represents whether the control is visible. You can also set the value. If set to true, it will be displayed.
